title: A page driving the display of the property by the editor

___additional-suggestions.title: A dictionary of additional suggestions lists depending on the specified labels values

___helper.title: The name of a selection helper class, date or typeahead

___additional-suggestions-labels.title: A list of labels to look for to apply additional suggestions depending on their value

___scaler.title: A standard scaler for number properties

___group.title: The list of vector properties to show together on a grid

___suggestions.title: A list of suggestions to make to the user when helper is 'typeahead'

___tag.title: The schema property to look for for tagging in lists
